Quick Start

Cargo



1[package]



2name = "hello-world"



3version = "0.1.0"



4edition = "2021"



5



6[dependencies]



7viz = { version = "0.4.2" }



8



9tokio = { version = "1.0", features = [



10  "rt-multi-thread",



11  "macros",



12] }

Main



1use std::net::SocketAddr;



2use viz::{Request, Result, Router, Server, ServiceMaker};



3



4async fn index(_: Request) -> Result<&'static str> {



5    Ok("Hello Viz")



6}



7



8#[tokio::main]



9async fn main() -> Result<()> {



10    let addr = SocketAddr::from(([127, 0, 0, 1], 3000));



11    println!("listening on {}", addr);



12



13    let app = Router::new().get("/", index);



14



15    if let Err(err) = Server::bind(&addr)



16        .serve(ServiceMaker::from(app))



17        .await



18    {



19        println!("{}", err);



20    }



21



22    Ok(())



23}
  • Cargo
  • Main
